document.full_text: president barack obama may face a tough audience when he brings his tax-hike-for- billionaires message to facebook on wednesday -- silicon valley is full of the sort of people the president wants to pay more taxes.
document.title: obama takes tax plan to facebook billionaires
lines_and_colors: president barack obama may face a tough audience when he brings his tax-hike-for- billionaires message to facebook on wednesday -- silicon valley is full of the sort of people the president wants to pay more taxes.
